Entire Agreement These Terms of Use constitute the entire agreement between you and SkyCeil regarding the use of the website and its services, superseding any prior agreements between you and SkyCeil. pages.disclaimer: SkyCeil - Legal Disclaimer and Information on Ceiling Services and Products +91-406-6298585 skyceil@gmail.com SkyCeil Home Why are we Solutions Comfort Services Styles of ceilings Disclaimer for SkyCeil Welcome to SkyCeil, your one-stop solution for all your ceiling needs. We are dedicated to providing you with the best quality products and services, but before you start exploring our website, we would like to make sure that you understand the following disclaimer. General Information The information provided on this website is for general informational purposes only. We strive to keep the information up to date and accurate, but we make no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability with respect to the website or the information, products, services, or related graphics contained on the website for any purpose. Any reliance you place on such information is therefore strictly at your own risk. Warranties and Disclaimers SkyCeil makes no warranties, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any information, products, or services provided on this website. SkyCeil expressly disclaims all warranties, including but not limited to, warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. SkyCeil does not warrant that this website, its servers, or email sent from SkyCeil are free of viruses or other harmful components. SkyCeil will not be liable for any damages of any kind arising from the use of this website, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, punitive, and consequential damages. Privacy SkyCeil is committed to protecting your privacy. We do not collect any personal information from you unless you voluntarily provide it to us. We may use the information you provide to us to process your orders, respond to your inquiries, and send you promotional materials. We will not sell, rent, or share your personal information with any third party without your consent, except as required by law. Security SkyCeil takes reasonable precautions to protect your personal information from loss, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no data transmission over the internet can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. Therefore, we cannot guarantee the security of any information you transmit to us, and you do so at your own risk. Cookies SkyCeil may use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your computer or mobile device when you visit a website. We use cookies to remember your preferences, track your use of our website, and provide you with targeted advertising. You may disable cookies in your browser settings, but doing so may affect the functionality of our website. Termination SkyCeil reserves the right to terminate your access to this website at any time, without notice, for any reason, including but not limited to violation of this disclaimer, breach of any applicable law or regulation, or engagement in any conduct that SkyCeil deems inappropriate or harmful. Products and Services SkyCeil offers a wide variety of ceiling products and services to meet your needs. However, we cannot guarantee that all products and services listed on our website will be available at all times. We reserve the right to discontinue any product or service at any time without notice. All products and services offered by SkyCeil are subject to availability and may be changed or discontinued at any time without notice. We make every effort to ensure that the information on our website is accurate and up-to-date, but we cannot guarantee that all information is error-free. Pricing All prices listed on the SkyCeil website are in US dollars and are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to change the prices of any product or service at any time without notice. However, we will always charge the price that is displayed on our website at the time you place your order. Shipping and Delivery SkyCeil ships its products to most locations within the India. However, we cannot guarantee that all products will be available for shipping to all locations. We reserve the right to refuse shipment to any location for any reason. Delivery times may vary depending on the product and the shipping method selected. We make every effort to ship products as quickly as possible, but we cannot guarantee delivery times. Delivery times are estimates only and are not guaranteed. If you have any questions or concerns about this disclaimer, please contact us at skyceil@gmail.com. We will do our best to address your concerns as soon as possible. pages.privacy-policy: SkyCeil - Privacy Policy: Protecting Your Personal Information and Ensuring Security +91-406-6298585 skyceil@gmail.com SkyCeil Home Why are we Solutions Comfort Services Styles of ceilings Privacy Policy for SkyCeil Information We Collect We collect personal information from you when you provide it to us voluntarily, such as when you place an order, create an account, sign up for our newsletter, or contact us with questions or feedback. The information we collect may include your name, email address, mailing address, phone number, and payment information. We also collect information automatically when you visit our site, such as your IP address, browser type, operating system, and the pages you visit. This information is used to improve the functionality and content of our site, and to help us understand how our site is being used. How We Use Your Information We use the personal information we collect to process your orders, communicate with you about your orders and account, and to send you promotional materials and other information that we think may be of interest to you. We may also use your information to personalize your experience on our site, to improve our products and services, and to prevent fraud and abuse. We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties for their marketing purposes. We may share your information with third-party service providers who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing, order fulfillment, and data analysis. These service providers are required to keep your information confidential and use it only for the purposes for which it was provided We may also disclose your information as required by law, such as to comply with a subpoena or other legal process, or when we believe in good faith that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights, protect your safety or the safety of others, investigate fraud, or respond to a government request. Cookies and Similar Technologies We use cookies and similar technologies, such as web beacons and pixels, to improve the functionality and performance of our site, to understand how our site is being used, and to deliver targeted advertising. Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow the website to recognize your device and remember your preferences and actions. We use both session cookies, which are deleted when you close your browser, and persistent cookies, which remain on your device until they expire or you delete them. We use cookies for a variety of purposes, including: To remember your login information and preferences To analyze site usage and improve site performance To deliver targeted advertising and measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies, but please note that doing so may affect the functionality of our site. Data Retention We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, to comply with our legal obligations, and to enforce our agreements. The length of time we retain your information depends on the purpose for which it was collected and the nature of the information. For example, we may retain your order information for a longer period of time to comply with tax and accounting regulations, while we may delete your browsing history on our site after a certain period of time. Your Rights Depending on your jurisdiction, you may have certain rights with respect to your personal information. These rights may include: The right to access, update, and correct inaccuracies in your personal information The right to request deletion of your personal information The right to object to or restrict the processing of your personal information The right to data portability, which allows you to receive a copy of your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format The right to withdraw your consent to the processing of your personal information at any time Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our use of your personal information, please contact us at skyceil@gmail.com.
